## Problem 2
### Manipulate the Mr.Trash Wheel sheet
```{r}
data_mr = read_excel("data/Trash Wheel Collection Data.xlsx") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  drop_na(dumpster) %>% 
  mutate(group = "mr")
data_mr = data_mr[,-15:-16]
data_mr[,13] = as.integer(unlist(round(data_mr[,13])))
```
